Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: How have things been? The shop looks good, and Maple and Raymond seemed to settle in nicely.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Which leaves for more good news, the Post Office is finally finished!

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Ah, you must have been so busy you forgot that we talked about the construction.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Well go check it out now! It's up in the top left corner of town. Turned out real nice. See ya around.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Ohh yes, and you guessed it - we have another person moving in!

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Didn't catch their name this time, but I will send them your way when they show up.
